tool_description: An API to retrieve information about Pokemons. Search, Filter, and Get a random
name: Pokemon Hub
title: Pokemon Hub

api_list.name: Search Pokemons
Get Pokemon By ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pokemon-hub.p.rapidapi.com/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pokemon-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pokemon-hub.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pokemon-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
